item.description: Have you ever been in a client meeting, when the subject of "How Much?" came up - before you were even given the details for the scope of the project, and wondered, "I wonder how other web developers navigate this topic?" I would like to host a roundtable discussion so that webdevs could hear from each other what they've found to be best practices on how to handle budget and price negotiations with clients, and other types of negotiations as well, design fee structures for work, develop proposals, and any other related topics around the business side of our business.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Roundtable Discussion on Fee Structures, Billing and Client Negotiations
